MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ StrokeDashArray { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的集合，这些值指示用于勾勒形状轮廓的虚线和间隙样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of values that indicate the pattern of dashes and gaps that is used to outline shapes.

value.span: 指定虚线和间隙样式的 值的集合。

span.span: A collection of values that specify the pattern of dashes and gaps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个集合中指定的长度短划线或间隙相对于的笔。Each in the collection specifies the length of a dash or gap relative to the of the pen. 例如，值`1`创建的短划线或具有相同的长度为粗细的笔 （方形） 的间隙。For example, a value of `1` creates a dash or gap that has the same length as the thickness of the pen (a square). 在该集合，这位于索引 0 处，第一项指定短划线; 的长度第二个项，位于索引 1 处，指定间隔的长度。The first item in the collection, which is located at index 0, specifies the length of a dash; the second item, which is located at index 1, specifies the length of a gap. 具有偶数索引值的对象指定短划线;具有奇数索引值的对象指定的差距。Objects with an even index value specify dashes; objects with an odd index value specify gaps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性已不起作用，如果你不具有任何顶点，如在一个元素上设置它元素。This property has no effect if you set it on an element that has no vertices, such as on a element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一种形状的顶点处使用的几个不同的联接。The following example shows several different joints used at the vertices of a shape. [!code-xaml[drawingwithshapeelements#PolylineExample1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingWithShapeElements/CS/polylineexample.xaml#polylineexample1)] 下图显示不同的行联接。The following illustration shows the different line joins. ![线条联接示例。](~/add/media/graphicslinejoins.png "的线条联接示例。")![Example of line joins.](~/add/media/graphicslinejoins.png "Example of line joins.")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double StrokeMiterLimit { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对斜接长度与 元素的 的一半之比的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets a limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the of a element.

value.span: 对斜接长度与 元素的 之比的限制。

span.span: The limit on the ratio of the miter length to the of a element.

value.span: 此值始终是大于或等于 1 的正数。

span.span: This value is always a positive number that is greater than or equal to 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接可以通过凹凸两个联接行尾形成边角。当两条线段满足锐角相交时，斜接可能会超出线条的粗度描绘路径。A miter forms a corner by beveling the ends of two joined lines.When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path.
